subtitle:
code Srt
downloadcontent_copy
expand_less
   1
00:00:13,000 --> 00:00:16,500
ji̍t--ah thâu chhut-lâi sî hó thiⁿ-khì
The sun comes out, the weather is fine


2
00:00:16,500 --> 00:00:20,500
khòaⁿ tio̍h chin hoaⁿ-hí
Looking at it makes me truly happy


3
00:00:20,500 --> 00:00:25,000
chhân-hn̂g ê tiū-sūi--ah
The rice ears in the fields


4
00:00:25,000 --> 00:00:29,000
kui-phiàn chin pá-tīⁿ
The whole area is very full and plump


5
00:00:30,000 --> 00:00:34,000
ta̍k-ke sio-chio lo̍h-khì chhân-tóe
Everyone invites each other down to the fields


6
00:00:34,000 --> 00:00:38,000
khoài-lo̍k beh lâi koah tiū-sūi
Happily coming to cut the rice ears


7
00:00:38,000 --> 00:00:42,000
bong tio̍h tiū-sūi kiâⁿ kàu siak-tháng piⁿ
Holding the rice, walking to the threshing bucket


8
00:00:42,000 --> 00:00:46,000
chi̍t-koân chi̍t-kē siak tio̍h tiū-sūi
Up and down, threshing the rice ears


9
00:00:46,000 --> 00:00:48,000
siak-pōng siak-pōng siak-siak-pōng-pōng
Thump-thump, thump-thump-thump


10
00:00:48,000 --> 00:00:51,000
hit ê siaⁿ-im
That sound


11
00:00:51,000 --> 00:00:54,500
phōaⁿ gún chhiùⁿ tio̍h khoài-lo̍k ê koa-si
Accompanies us singing happy songs


12
00:00:55,000 --> 00:00:59,000
téng--ah khu koah liáu sī koah ē-khu
Finished cutting the upper plot, now cutting the lower plot


13
00:00:59,000 --> 00:01:04,000
tiū-chháu móa chhân-hn̂g
Rice straw fills the fields


14
00:01:04,000 --> 00:01:08,000
ū-lâng teh khioh tiū-seh
Someone is picking up loose rice grains


15
00:01:08,000 --> 00:01:12,000
khioh kàu thâu lôe-lôe
Picking up until their head is bowed low


16
00:01:12,000 --> 00:01:16,000
ta̍k-ke phah-piàⁿ móa-sin lâu-kōaⁿ
Everyone works hard, sweating all over


17
00:01:16,000 --> 00:01:21,000
tiám-tiám tih kah móa chhân-hōaⁿ
Dripping drop by drop all over the field ridges


18
00:01:21,000 --> 00:01:25,000
la̍k-ge̍h thiⁿ-khì tng joa̍h ê sî-kî
June weather, the time when it's hottest


19
00:01:25,000 --> 00:01:29,000
chi̍t-koân chi̍t-kē siak tio̍h tiū-sūi
Up and down, threshing the rice ears


20
00:01:29,000 --> 00:01:31,000
siak-pōng siak-pōng siak-siak-pōng-pōng
Thump-thump, thump-thump-thump


21
00:01:31,000 --> 00:01:33,000
hit ê siaⁿ-im
That sound


22
00:01:33,000 --> 00:01:37,000
phōaⁿ gún chhiùⁿ tio̍h khoài-lo̍k ê koa-si
Accompanies us singing happy songs


23
00:01:46,000 --> 00:01:50,000
tōa-niû taⁿ lâi sī tiám-sim-tǹg
The eldest lady carries over the snack meal


24
00:01:50,000 --> 00:01:55,000
taⁿ kàu chhân-hōaⁿ piⁿ
Carrying it to the edge of the field ridge


25
00:01:55,000 --> 00:01:59,000
kiò tio̍h gún chiām hioh-khùn
Calling us to rest for a while


26
00:01:59,000 --> 00:02:03,000
chia̍h tio̍h tiám-sim-tǹg
To eat the snack meal


27
00:02:03,000 --> 00:02:07,000
ta̍k-ke chia̍h kah chhùi-á khui-khui
Everyone eats with mouths smiling wide


28
00:02:07,000 --> 00:02:11,500
khòaⁿ tio̍h si̍t-chāi chin chhù-bī
Looking at it is really interesting and fun


29
00:02:11,500 --> 00:02:16,000
chia̍h pá tiám-sim iū-koh koah tiū-sūi
After eating snacks, back to cutting rice ears again


30
00:02:16,000 --> 00:02:20,000
chi̍t-koân chi̍t-kē siak tio̍h tiū-sūi
Up and down, threshing the rice ears


31
00:02:20,000 --> 00:02:22,000
siak-pōng siak-pōng siak-siak-pōng-pōng
Thump-thump, thump-thump-thump


32
00:02:22,000 --> 00:02:24,000
hit ê siaⁿ-im
That sound


33
00:02:24,000 --> 00:02:28,000
phōaⁿ gún chhiùⁿ tio̍h khoài-lo̍k ê koa-si
Accompanies us singing happy songs


34
00:02:37,000 --> 00:02:41,000
chit ê tháng koah liáu sī iū chi̍t-tháng
Finished cutting one bucket, then another bucket


35
00:02:41,000 --> 00:02:46,000
kin-nî hó-nî-tang
This year is a good harvest year


36
00:02:46,000 --> 00:02:50,000
tiū-á koah liáu kha-chhiú sng
After cutting rice, legs and arms are sore


37
00:02:50,000 --> 00:02:55,000
ji̍t-thâu chiām hông-hun
The sun is gradually setting into twilight


38
00:02:55,000 --> 00:02:59,000
ta̍k-ke tńg-khì sé hó sin-khu
Everyone goes back to wash their bodies clean


39
00:02:59,000 --> 00:03:03,000
sio-chio lâi-khì chia̍h-hó-tǹg
Inviting each other to go eat a good meal


40
00:03:03,000 --> 00:03:08,000
nā-sī thiⁿ kng iu-goân tiàm chhân-hn̂g
When dawn breaks, we'll be in the fields again


41
00:03:08,000 --> 00:03:12,000
chi̍t-koân chi̍t-kē siak tio̍h tiū-sūi
Up and down, threshing the rice ears


42
00:03:12,000 --> 00:03:14,000
siak-pōng siak-pōng siak-siak-pōng-pōng
Thump-thump, thump-thump-thump


43
00:03:14,000 --> 00:03:16,000
hit ê siaⁿ-im
That sound


44
00:03:16,000 --> 00:03:20,000
phōaⁿ gún chhiùⁿ tio̍h khoài-lo̍k ê koa-si
Accompanies us singing happy songs
